definition: Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: HK$5,000 for the stamp duty deposit.
sentences.chinese: 港幣五千元之印花稅按金。

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港幣二十八元。

sentences.english: His venture with three Hong Kong dollars to create a fortune, and foremost to remain uncorrupted .
sentences.chinese: 他三元港幣創業，能處銅臭之中而不改其心。

sentences.english: An additional HKD100. - monthly fee will be charged if Diners Club is to be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 如選擇接受大來信用證，將額外收取月費港幣壹佰圓。

sentences.english: The average rate for the second floor is two hundred Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 第二層的平均租金是每平方英尺港幣二百元。

sentences.english: Donation of HK$100 or above is tax-deductible.
sentences.chinese: 捐款港幣一百元或以上可獲免稅。

sentences.english: The minimum charge per month is HK$20.00.
sentences.chinese: 每月通話最低收費爲港幣20元正。

sentences.english: Any loss or destroy of the membership card, $50 compensative procedures fee shall be given.
sentences.chinese: 會員卡如有遺失或損毀，補領手續爲每張港幣50元。

sentences.english: An official receipt will be issued for donation of HK$100 or above.
sentences.chinese: 凡捐款港幣一百元或以上，可獲發正式收據。

sentences.english: Applicants are required to pay a deposit of HK$100 per chip upon application.
sentences.chinese: 於報名時，每個晶片需繳付港幣100元之按金。

sentences.english: The admission ticket is HK$50 each, students and elderly are entitled to enjoy 50% discount.
sentences.chinese: 入場券每張港幣五十元正，學生和長者半價優惠。

sentences.english: Business is possible if you ca fantastic lower the price to HK$2150.
sentences.chinese: 你方若能削價到2150港幣，或者成交。

sentences.english: The balance is forty_three thousand Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 費用餘額是港幣四萬三千元。

sentences.english: Official receipts will be issued for donation of HK$100 or above.
sentences.chinese: 捐款港幣一百元或以上，方可獲發捐款收據。

sentences.english: Delivery Service is only available when your purchase is over HK$300.
sentences.chinese: 購物必需滿港幣HK$300，方享有送貨服務。

sentences.english: The security deposit is two months rent, which is eighty-four thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 押金是兩個月房租，八萬四千港幣。

definition: Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
